text: Jya divasi allaha tumha sarvanna, tya ekatrita kele janyacya divasi ekatra karila, toca parajaya ani vijayaca divasa ahe, ani jo (manusya) allahavara imana rakhuna satkarma karila, allaha tyacyapasuna tyaci duskarme dura karila ani tyala jannatimadhye dakhala karila, jyancya khali pravaha vahata aheta, jyancyata te sadaivakala rahatila. Hica phara mothi saphalata ahe
